items.title: 萨武德里亚星轨 (原标题: Savudrija Star Trails)
items.summary:
## 萨武德里亚星轨：夜空下的灯塔与星辰

### 文章概述

本文介绍了一张展示萨武德里亚灯塔上空星轨的夜空景象，该图像是每日天文一图（APOD）的特色内容。

### 主要内容

*   **背景地点**：
    *   照片拍摄于伊斯特拉半岛北端海岸线附近的萨武德里亚灯塔上空。
    *   该灯塔是一座历史悠久的建筑，建于19世纪早期，是亚得里亚海航海者的导航辅助设施。

*   **天体导航与星轨现象**：
    *   除了灯塔，天空中还有一个更古老的导航辅助——北极星（小熊座的α星）。
    *   在图像中，北极星在北天极附近形成了最短的亮弧。
    *   北天极是地球自转轴在空间中的延伸，它精确地位于所有同心星轨的中心。

*   **图像制作**：
    *   这张复合图像是通过数字堆栈400张照片而成的。
    *   每张照片的曝光时间为30秒。
    *   拍摄时，相机和三脚架固定在“旋转的行星”（即地球）上，从而捕捉到星轨的效果。

### 相关图片

*   **萨武德里亚星轨**：
    *   ![萨武德里亚星轨](https://apod.nasa.gov/apod/image/2506/SavudrijaSTARTRAILS_Nadj1024.jpg)
    *   此图片展示了萨武德里亚灯塔与上空围绕北天极形成的同心星轨。
items.shortSummary: 这张天文照片展示了伊斯特拉半岛北部萨武德里亚灯塔上空的星轨。画面中，历史悠久的灯塔与天空中作为导航辅助的北极星（小熊座α星）交相辉映。北极星在北天极附近形成最短的亮弧，所有同心星轨都围绕北天极。这张复合图像由400张30秒的曝光照片堆栈而成，展现了地球自转的视觉效果。

images.alt:
See Explanation.  Clicking on the picture will download
the highest resolution version available.

items.content:
Savudrija Star Trails
Image Credit & Copyright: Branko Nadj
Explanation: Savudrija lighthouse shines along the coast near the northern end of the Istrian peninsula in this well-composed night skyscape. A navigational aid for sailors on the Adriatic Sea, the historic lighthouse was constructed in the early 19th century. But an even older aid to navigation shines in the sky above, Polaris, alpha star of the constellation Ursa Minor and also known as the North Star. In this scene Polaris forms the shortest bright arc near the North Celestial Pole, the extension of Earth's axis of rotation into space. Of course, the North Celestial Pole lies exactly at the center of all the concentric startrails. The composite image is a digital stack of 400 exposures, each 30 seconds long, taken with camera and tripod fixed to a rotating planet.

items.title: 通往鲁宾天文台的银河之路 (原标题: A Milky Road to the Rubin Observatory)
items.summary:
# 鲁宾天文台与银河之路

本文介绍了位于智利塞罗帕琼的维拉·C·鲁宾天文台（Vera C. Rubin Observatory），该天文台由美国国家科学基金会（NSF）和能源部（DOE）委托建造，目前正处于最终测试阶段，即将投入日常运行。

## 天文台的使命与能力
鲁宾天文台的核心任务是探索夜空每晚如何变化。为了实现这一目标，它将每隔几个晚上持续重新拍摄整个可见天空。通过这种方式，天文台旨在：
*   发现新的超新星。
*   识别潜在危险的小行星。
*   探测微弱的彗星。
*   观测变星。
*   绘制可见宇宙的大尺度结构。

该天文台配备了一面直径超过8米的巨型主镜，使其能够高效地捕捉宇宙的动态变化，并揭示关于我们宇宙及其多样化天体的更多信息。

## 特色图片：通往鲁宾天文台的银河之路
文章中展示了一张令人惊叹的图片，名为“通往鲁宾天文台的银河之路”。这张图片由鲁宾天文台的保罗·阿松桑·拉戈（Paulo Assunção Lago）拍摄，并由NSF、DOE和鲁宾天文台提供。

![鲁宾天文台与银河](https://apod.nasa.gov/apod/image/2506/RubinMw_assuncao_960.jpg)

图片中，我们银河系遥远的中心带似乎从这座新近投入运行的天文台延伸而出。这张特色图片是上个月拍摄的，由21张夜空图像合成，捕捉到了地平线上的气辉和左下角的小麦哲伦星系。

这张图片是“每日一天文图”（Astronomy Picture of the Day, APOD）的一部分，APOD每天都会展示一幅关于宇宙的图像或照片，并附有专业天文学家的简短解释。
items.shortSummary: 维拉·C·鲁宾天文台位于智利，由美国NSF和DOE委托建造，即将投入运行。该天文台配备8米主镜，将每隔几晚持续重拍整个可见天空，旨在探索夜空变化，发现新超新星、危险小行星、彗星和变星，并绘制宇宙大尺度结构。其目标是揭示宇宙的动态变化和多样天体。
items.translated_title: 通往鲁宾天文台的银河之路

images.alt:
A large telescope appears on the left. The band of our
Milky Way Galaxy extends from the telescope to the upper
right of the image. The horizon has a slight glow.
Please see the explanation for more detailed information.

items.content:
A Milky Road to the Rubin Observatory
Image Credit: NSF, DOE, Rubin Obs., Paulo Assunção Lago (Rubin Obs.)
Explanation: Is the sky the same every night? No -- the night sky changes every night in many ways. To better explore how the night sky changes, the USA's NSF and DOE commissioned the Vera C. Rubin Observatory in Cerro Pachón, Chile. In final testing before routine operations, Rubin will begin to explore these nightly changes -- slight differences that can tell us much about our amazing universe and its surprising zoo of objects. With a mirror over 8 meters across, Rubin will continually reimage the entire visible sky every few nights to discover new supernovas, potentially dangerous asteroids, faint comets, and variable stars -- as well as mapping out the visible universe's large-scale structure. Pictured, the distant central band of our Milky Way Galaxy appears to flow out from the newly operational observatory. Taken last month, the featured picture is a composite of 21 images across the night sky, capturing airglow on the horizon and the Small Magellanic Cloud galaxy on the lower left.

items.title: 亚速尔群岛上空的彩虹气辉 (原标题: Rainbow Airglow over the Azores)
items.summary:
## 亚速尔群岛上空的彩虹气辉

![亚速尔群岛上空的彩虹气辉](https://apod.nasa.gov/apod/image/2506/GravityWaves_Claro_960.jpg)

*图片来源与版权：Miguel Claro (TWAN)；翻转注释：Judy Schmidt*

### 气辉现象

*   **定义与可见性：** 气辉是指天空持续发光的现象，但通常难以用肉眼察觉。然而，当大气中出现扰动（例如接近的风暴）时，可能会引起明显的涟漪，从而使气辉变得可见。
*   **彩虹气辉的成因：** 这种彩虹状的条纹是由“重力波”引起的。重力波是空气中的振荡，类似于将石头投入平静水面时产生的涟漪。长时间曝光，特别是沿着气辉垂直壁的方向拍摄，使得这种波动的结构异常清晰。

### 颜色来源

*   **深红色：** 这种深红色的光芒可能来自约87公里高空的OH分子，它们受到太阳紫外线的激发而发光。
*   **橙色和绿色：** 橙色和绿色的气辉则可能由稍高处的钠原子和氧原子引起。

### 拍摄地点与背景

*   **拍摄地点：** 这幅精彩的图像是在葡萄牙亚速尔群岛的皮科山（Mount Pico）攀登过程中捕捉到的。
*   **地面灯光：** 图像中的地面灯光源自大西洋中的法亚尔岛（Faial）。
*   **天体背景：** 透过这些带状气辉，可以看到壮丽的夜空。我们银河系的中心带向上延伸至图像中央，而仙女座星系（M31）则清晰可见于图像的左上方。
items.shortSummary: 这幅图像展示了亚速尔群岛上空罕见的“彩虹气辉”。气辉是大气中持续的发光，但通常难以察觉。这种彩虹状的条纹是由重力波引起的，这些波是大气中因扰动（如风暴）产生的振荡。深红色气辉来自约87公里高的OH分子，橙色和绿色则由钠和氧原子产生。这张照片在葡萄牙皮科山拍摄，背景中可见银河系和仙女座星系。
items.translated_title: 亚速尔群岛上空的彩虹气辉

images.alt:
A starfield is seen over water, clouds, and the lights of
a city below. The starfield is oddly not black, but shows a 
repeating assortment of transparent colors diagonally from the lower
left to the upper right. 
Please see the explanation for more detailed information.

items.content:
Rainbow Airglow over the Azores
Image Credit & Copyright: Miguel Claro (TWAN); Rollover Annotation: Judy Schmidt
Explanation: Why would the sky glow like a giant repeating rainbow? Airglow. Now, air glows all of the time, but it is usually hard to see. A disturbance however -- like an approaching storm -- may cause noticeable rippling in the Earth's atmosphere. These gravity waves are oscillations in air analogous to those created when a rock is thrown in calm water. The long-duration exposure nearly along the vertical walls of airglow likely made the undulating structure particularly visible. OK, but where do the colors originate? The deep red glow likely originates from OH molecules about 87 kilometers high, excited by ultraviolet light from the Sun. The orange and green airglow is likely caused by sodium and oxygen atoms slightly higher up. The featured image was captured during a climb up Mount Pico in the Azores of Portugal. Ground lights originate from the island of Faial in the Atlantic Ocean. A spectacular sky is visible through this banded airglow, with the central band of our Milky Way Galaxy running up the image center, and M31, the Andromeda Galaxy, visible near the top left.

items.title: 面纱星云：古老超新星的缕缕残迹 (原标题: Veil Nebula: Wisps of an Ancient Supernova)
items.summary:
# 面纱星云：古老超新星的缕缕残迹

面纱星云是银河系中一颗恒星爆炸后留下的可见残迹。

## 形成与历史
*   大约7000年前，一颗恒星发生超新星爆炸，形成了面纱星云。
*   在爆炸发生时，这团膨胀的星云可能像新月一样明亮，在有文字记载历史的初期，对当时的人们来说，它清晰可见并持续了数周。

## 当前状态与观测
*   如今，这个超新星遗迹，也被称为天鹅座圈（Cygnus Loop），已经逐渐黯淡。
*   现在，它只能通过小型望远镜在天鹅座（Cygnus）方向观测到。
*   尽管距离地球约1400光年，面纱星云的实际尺寸非常巨大，在天空中覆盖的面积是满月的五倍多。

## 特色图像
*   以下图像展示了面纱星云的广阔景象，由Abdullah Alharbi于2024年中期在科威特拍摄。
*   图像中，氢气发出的光显示为红色，氧气发出的光显示为蓝色。
*   在这类完整的面纱星云深空图像中，即使是经验丰富的观测者也可能难以辨认出其标志性的丝状结构。

![面纱星云的广阔景象](https://apod.nasa.gov/apod/image/2506/VeilWide_Alharbi_960.jpg)
items.shortSummary: 面纱星云是约7000年前一颗恒星超新星爆炸后留下的壮观遗迹，也被称为天鹅座圈。它曾像新月般明亮，如今已黯淡，但仍是巨大的超新星残骸，距离地球约1400光年，在天空中覆盖面积是满月的五倍多。现在需通过小型望远镜才能观测到其红色氢气和蓝色氧气发出的光芒。
items.translated_title: 面纱星云：古老超新星的缕缕残迹

images.alt:
The featured image shows a night sky with a large
complex nebula in red and blue. The Veil Nebula has several famous
components such as the Bat and Witch's Broom Nebulas. 
Please see the explanation for more detailed information.

items.content:
Veil Nebula: Wisps of an Ancient Supernova
Image Credit & Copyright: Abdullah Alharbi
Explanation: Wisps like this are all that remain visible of a Milky Way star. About 7,000 years ago that star exploded in a supernova, leaving the Veil Nebula. At the time, the expanding cloud was likely as bright as a crescent Moon, remaining visible for weeks to people living at the dawn of recorded history. Today, the resulting supernova remnant, also known as the Cygnus Loop, has faded and is now visible only through a small telescope directed toward the constellation of the Swan (Cygnus). The remaining Veil Nebula is physically huge, however, and even though it lies about 1,400 light-years distant, it covers over five times the size of the full Moon. The featured picture was taken in Kuwait in mid-2024 and features light emitted by hydrogen in red and oxygen in blue. In deep images of the complete Veil Nebula like this, even studious readers might not be able to identify the iconic filaments.

items.title: UGC 1810：哈勃望远镜观测到的剧烈相互作用星系 (原标题: UGC 1810: Wildly Interacting Galaxy from Hubble)
items.summary:
### UGC 1810：哈勃望远镜观测到的剧烈相互作用星系

*   **文章来源：** 每日天文图片 (Astronomy Picture of the Day, APOD)
*   **主要内容：** 本文介绍了由哈勃望远镜观测到的星系UGC 1810，它正与其较小的伴星系进行剧烈的引力相互作用。
*   **星系特征：**
    *   UGC 1810本身是一个螺旋星系，但与它的碰撞伙伴共同被称为Arp 273。
    *   UGC 1810的整体形状，特别是其独特的蓝色外环，很可能是剧烈且猛烈的引力相互作用的结果。
    *   这个蓝色外环的颜色是由在过去几百万年内形成的大质量、炽热的蓝色恒星所致。
    *   星系内部区域显得更古老、更红，并交织着凉爽的丝状尘埃。
*   **位置与距离：** Arp 273距离地球约3亿光年，位于仙女座方向。
*   **未来演变：** 在接下来的十亿年里，UGC 1810很可能会吞噬其伴星系，并最终演变成一个经典的螺旋星系形态。
*   **图像信息：**
    *   图像展示了一个明亮的星系，其拥有不寻常的蓝色螺旋臂，背景是黑暗的星场。
    *   螺旋的外部分呈现为一个蓝色环，而内部则显示出独立且颜色更偏棕褐色的螺旋结构。
    *   图像中还有一些前景的亮星（与UGC 1810无关）和背景中的其他星系。
    *   图片来源：NASA, ESA, Hubble, HLA；处理与版权：Domingo Pestana。
    *   图片链接：https://apod.nasa.gov/apod/image/2506/Arp273Main_HubblePestana_1080.jpg
items.shortSummary: 哈勃望远镜观测到的UGC 1810是一个正在与伴星系剧烈相互作用的螺旋星系，它们共同构成Arp 273。其独特的蓝色外环由新形成的大质量恒星构成，而内部区域则更显古老。该星系距离地球约3亿光年，位于仙女座方向。预计在未来十亿年内，UGC 1810将吞噬其伴星系，并演变为经典的螺旋形态。
items.translated_title: UGC 1810：哈勃望远镜观测到的剧烈相互作用星系

images.alt:
A bright galaxy with unusual blue spiral arms is shown
against a dark starfield. The outer part of the spiral 
appears as a blue ring, while the inner part appears to
have separate -- and more tan -- spiral structure. 
Please see the explanation for more detailed information.

items.content:
UGC 1810: Wildly Interacting Galaxy from Hubble
Image Credit: NASA, ESA, Hubble, HLA; Processing & Copyright: Domingo Pestana
Explanation: What's happening to this spiral galaxy? Although details remain uncertain, it surely has to do with an ongoing battle with its smaller galactic neighbor. The featured galaxy is labelled UGC 1810 by itself, but together with its collisional partner is known as Arp 273. The overall shape of UGC 1810 -- in particular its blue outer ring -- is likely a result of wild and violent gravitational interactions. This ring's blue color is caused by massive stars that are blue hot and have formed only in the past few million years. The inner galaxy appears older, redder, and threaded with cool filamentary dust. A few bright stars appear well in the foreground, unrelated to UGC 1810, while several galaxies are visible well in the background. Arp 273 lies about 300 million light years away toward the constellation of Andromeda. Quite likely, UGC 1810 will devour its galactic sidekick over the next billion years and settle into a classic spiral form.

items.title: 日落残像 (原标题: Sunset Afterimage)
items.summary:
## 每日天文一图：日落残像

**发布日期：** 2025年5月31日

**图片：**
*   [日落残像](https://apod.nasa.gov/apod/image/2505/Afterimageorizontalcrop.jpeg)

**解释：**

这张数字天空景观照片捕捉了5月7日太阳在意大利西西里岛拉古萨一座教堂钟楼后方落下的景象。照片经过滤镜处理和修改，呈现出奇特的色彩。

文章介绍了“残像”这一有趣的光学错觉，它能帮助观察者以更自然的色彩体验同一场景。要尝试这种体验，请遵循以下步骤：

1.  找到蓝色太阳盘底部附近活跃区域AR4079的黑子群。
2.  放松并凝视这些黑暗的黑子群约30秒。
3.  闭上眼睛或将目光移至一块纯白色表面。
4.  片刻之后，日落的残像会隐约出现。

**残像特点：**

*   残像将呈现出原始照片的互补色。
*   太阳将显示为正常的黄色。
*   天空将呈现出熟悉的蓝色。
items.shortSummary: 2025年5月31日的“每日天文一图”展示了西西里岛一幅经过处理的日落数字景观，其色彩奇特。文章解释了“残像”这一光学错觉。通过凝视图片中蓝色太阳盘上的黑子约30秒，然后闭眼或看向白色表面，观察者将体验到日落的残像，其色彩将是原始图片的互补色，呈现出更自然的黄色太阳和蓝色天空。

images.alt:
See Explanation.  Clicking on the picture will download
the highest resolution version available.

items.content:
Afterimage Sunset
Image Credit & Copyright: Marcella Giulia Pace
Explanation: On May 7, the Sun setting behind a church bell tower was captured in this filtered and manipulated digital skyscape from Ragusa, Sicily, planet Earth. In this version of the image the colors look bizarre. Still, an intriguing optical illusion known as an afterimage can help you experience the same scene with a more natural looking appearance. To try it, find the sunspots of active region AR4079 grouped near the bottom of the blue solar disk. Relax and stare at the dark sunspot group for about 30 seconds, then close your eyes or shift your gaze to a plain white surface. In a moment an afterimage of the sunset should faintly appear. But the afterimage sunset will have this image's complementary colors and a more normal yellow Sun against a familiar blue sky.

items.title: 火星的逆行环路 (原标题: Mars in the Loop)
items.summary:
### 文章来源：每日天文一图 (APOD)

每日天文一图（Astronomy Picture of the Day, APOD）每天展示一张迷人的宇宙图像或照片，并附有专业天文学家撰写的简要解释，旨在帮助人们探索宇宙。

### 主题：火星的环路

*   **图像内容**：这张合成图像忠实地描绘了火星在2024年9月19日（右上）至2025年5月18日（左下）期间，在地球夜空中穿过双子座和巨蟹座时所形成的顺时针环路。
*   **图像构成**：该图像由多张照片合成，这些照片的拍摄间隔为5到9天，具体取决于天气条件。

### 火星的逆行运动

*   **现象解释**：火星实际上并没有逆转其轨道方向。这种相对于背景恒星的“倒退”运动，是地球自身轨道运动的反映。
*   **发生机制**：当地球在自身相对较近的轨道上运行速度更快，从而超越并赶上那些轨道距离太阳更远的行星时，就会观察到这种视向的逆行运动。

### 关键时间点与观测细节

*   **逆行开始**：火星的视向东移在大约2024年12月8日开始逆转，当时它似乎停留在巨蟹座的疏散星团M44（蜂巢星团）附近。
*   **路径与回归**：在向西“漫游”到双子座的亮星北河二（Castor）和北河三（Pollux）下方后，火星于2025年5月初再次回到M44附近。
*   **最亮与最近**：在2025年1月16日冲日（opposition）前后，火星亮度达到最亮，当时它距离地球仅9600万公里。

### 相关图片

*   [火星的环路图像](https://apod.nasa.gov/apod/image/2505/Ma2024-5_1024.jpg)
items.shortSummary: 每日天文一图展示了火星在2024年9月至2025年5月间在夜空中形成的视向“环路”。这种看似倒退的运动是地球在轨道上超越火星所致的逆行现象。火星于2024年12月8日左右开始逆行，并在2025年1月16日冲日时达到最亮，距离地球9600万公里。它在巨蟹座M44星团附近徘徊，并最终返回该区域。

images.alt:
See Explanation.  Clicking on the picture will download
the highest resolution version available.

items.content:
Mars in the Loop
Image Credit & Copyright: Tunc Tezel (TWAN)
Explanation: This composite of images spaced a weather-permitting 5 to 9 days apart, from 2024 September 19 (top right) through 2025 May 18 (bottom left), faithfully traces ruddy-colored Mars as it makes a clockwise loop through the constellations Gemini and Cancer in planet Earth's night sky. You can connect the dots and dates with your cursor over the image, but be sure to check out this animation of the Red Planet's 2024/25 retrograde motion. Of course Mars didn't actually reverse the direction of its orbit. Instead, the apparent backwards motion with respect to the background stars is a reflection of the orbital motion of Earth itself. Retrograde motion can be seen each time Earth overtakes and laps planets orbiting farther from the Sun, the Earth moving more rapidly through its own relatively close-in orbit. In this case Mars' apparent eastward motion began to reverse around December 8, when it seemed to linger near open star cluster M44 in Cancer. After wandering back to the west, under Gemini's bright stars Castor and Pollux, Mars returned to pose near M44 by early May. At its brightest near opposition on 2025 January 16, Mars was a mere 96 million kilometers away.

items.title: 不规则矮星系 六分仪座A (原标题: Irregular Dwarf Galaxy Sextans A)
items.summary:
### 不规则矮星系 六分仪座A

*   **概述**
    *   尽管宏伟的螺旋星系因其年轻、明亮的蓝色星团和粉红色恒星形成区而备受关注，但小型星系如不规则矮星系六分仪座A也同样在形成恒星。

*   **特征**
    *   六分仪座A的年轻星团和恒星形成区聚集在一个糖果状的区域内，直径仅约5,000光年。
    *   在彩色望远镜视图中，前景的银河系恒星呈现出尖刺状和黄色的外观。

*   **位置与距离**
    *   该小型星系位于航海星座六分仪座的方向。
    *   距离地球约450万光年。
    *   它位于本星系群的边缘附近，本星系群包括仙女座星系和我们自己的银河系等大型螺旋星系。

*   **图片**
    *   [不规则矮星系六分仪座A](https://apod.nasa.gov/apod/image/2505/sexa_gemsbock_cdk_pub1024.jpg)
items.shortSummary: 六分仪座A是一个不规则矮星系，距离地球约450万光年，位于本星系群边缘。它是一个活跃的恒星形成区，年轻的星团和恒星形成区集中在一个约5,000光年宽的区域内。与大型螺旋星系不同，六分仪座A展示了小型星系独特的恒星形成过程。
items.translated_title: 不规则矮星系 六分仪座A

images.alt:
See Explanation.  Clicking on the picture will download
the highest resolution version available.

items.content:
Irregular Dwarf Galaxy Sextans A
Image Credit & Copyright: Franz Hofmann, Gemsbock Observatory
Explanation: Grand spiral galaxies often seem to get all the attention, flaunting young, bright, blue star clusters and pinkish star forming regions along graceful, symmetric spiral arms. But small galaxies form stars too, like irregular dwarf galaxy Sextans A. Its young star clusters and star forming regions are gathered into a gumdrop-shaped region a mere 5,000 light-years across. Seen toward the navigational constellation Sextans, the small galaxy lies some 4.5 million light-years distant. That puts it near the outskirts of the local group of galaxies, that includes the large, massive spirals Andromeda and our own Milky Way. Brighter Milky Way foreground stars appear spiky and yellowish in this colorful telescopic view of Sextans A.

items.title: 赫比格-哈罗 24 (原标题: Herbig Haro 24)
items.summary:
# 赫比格-哈罗 24：新生恒星的宇宙喷流

这张由哈勃空间望远镜图像数据构建的惊人景象展示了赫比格-哈罗 24 (HH 24) 的宇宙喷流，它看起来像一把“双刃光剑”。

## 图像信息
*   **图像来源**: NASA, ESA, Hubble Heritage (STScI / AURA) / Hubble-Europe Collaboration
*   **图片**: ![赫比格-哈罗 24](https://apod.nasa.gov/apod/image/2505/hs-2015-42-a-largeHH241024.jpg)
*   **致谢**: D. Padgett (GSFC), T. Megeath (University of Toledo), B. Reipurth (University of Hawaii)

## 赫比格-哈罗 24 的特征
*   **本质**: HH 24 实际上是两股从一颗新生恒星（原恒星）喷射出的宇宙喷流。
*   **尺寸与距离**: 场景横跨约半光年，距离地球约 1,300 光年（或 400 秒差距）。
*   **位置**: 位于猎户座 B 分子云复合体的恒星形成区。
*   **外观**: 图像中狭窄、高能的喷流穿过该区域的星际物质，沿其路径产生一系列发光的激波前沿，形似“双刃光剑”。

## 喷流的形成机制
*   **中心原恒星**: HH 24 的中心原恒星被冷尘埃和气体组成的旋转吸积盘所环绕，因此无法直接观测到。
*   **物质吸积**: 当吸积盘中的物质落向这颗年轻的恒星天体时，它会升温。
*   **喷流喷射**: 沿着系统自转轴，相对的喷流被喷射而出，形成了我们所见的壮观景象。
items.shortSummary: 赫比格-哈罗 24 (HH 24) 是一对从新生恒星喷射出的宇宙喷流，形似“双刃光剑”。它位于猎户座 B 分子云复合体中，距离地球约1300光年，横跨约半光年。这些喷流由哈勃空间望远镜观测，其形成机制是中心原恒星吸积盘中的物质落入并加热后，沿自转轴喷射出高能物质，与星际物质碰撞产生发光激波。

images.alt:
See Explanation.  Clicking on the picture will download
the highest resolution version available.

items.content:
Herbig-Haro 24
Image Credit: NASA, ESA, Hubble Heritage (STScI / AURA) / Hubble-Europe Collaboration
Acknowledgment: D. Padgett (GSFC), T. Megeath (University of Toledo), B. Reipurth (University of Hawaii)
Explanation: This might look like a double-bladed lightsaber, but these two cosmic jets actually beam outward from a newborn star in a galaxy near you. Constructed from Hubble Space Telescope image data, the stunning scene spans about half a light-year across Herbig-Haro 24 (HH 24), some 1,300 light-years or 400 parsecs away in the stellar nurseries of the Orion B molecular cloud complex. Hidden from direct view, HH 24's central protostar is surrounded by cold dust and gas flattened into a rotating accretion disk. As material from the disk falls toward the young stellar object, it heats up. Opposing jets are blasted out along the system's rotation axis. Cutting through the region's interstellar matter, the narrow, energetic jets produce a series of glowing shock fronts along their path.

items.title: 蛇夫座ζ星、蛇夫座ρ星与银河 (原标题: Zeta and Rho Ophiuchi with Milky Way)
items.summary:
# 蛇夫座ζ星、蛇夫座ρ星与银河：夜空中的光影交织

这篇文章是“每日天文一图”（Astronomy Picture of the Day, APOD）的精选，展示了一幅令人印象深刻的夜空景象，旨在帮助人们探索宇宙。

## 图像信息
*   **日期**: 2025年5月27日
*   **图片**: ![蛇夫座ζ星、蛇夫座ρ星与银河](https://apod.nasa.gov/apod/image/2505/RhoZeta_Nowak_960.jpg)
*   **图片来源与版权**: Ireneusz Nowak

## 图像内容与解释
这幅广域合成图像捕捉了夜空中一个极具摄影美感的区域，总曝光时间超过17小时，于去年六月在南非拍摄。

### 主要特征
*   **银河系**: 我们的银河系带对角线地延伸在图像的左下角。
*   **蛇夫座ρ星云复合体**: 彩色斑斓的蛇夫座ρ星云复合体位于画面中心偏右。
*   **蛇夫座ζ星云**: 大型红色圆形蛇夫座ζ星云出现在画面顶部附近。

### 颜色含义
*   **红色**: 通常来自被激发氢气发光形成的星云。
*   **蓝色**: 标志着星际尘埃优先反射明亮年轻恒星的光芒。
*   **深棕色**: 通常表示厚重的尘埃区域。

### 其他标志性天体
图像中还包含了一些夜空中的标志性天体，包括：
*   明亮的**心宿二** (Antares)
*   球状星团**M4**
*   **蓝色马头星云** (Blue Horsehead nebula)
items.shortSummary: 这幅“每日天文一图”展示了夜空中一个色彩斑斓的区域，包括银河系、蛇夫座ρ星云复合体和大型红色蛇夫座ζ星云。图像中，红色代表氢气星云，蓝色是反射星光尘埃，深棕色是厚重尘埃。此外，还可辨认出心宿二、M4星团和蓝色马头星云。这张广域合成图耗时17小时，摄于南非。
items.translated_title: 蛇夫座ζ星、蛇夫座ρ星与银河

images.alt:
A very colorful sky field is shown featuring many stars and
nebulas that appear red, yellow, blue, and brown. 
Please see the explanation for more detailed information.

items.content:
Zeta and Rho Ophiuchi with Milky Way
Image Credit & Copyright: Ireneusz Nowak
Explanation: Behold one of the most photogenic regions of the night sky, captured impressively. Featured, the band of our Milky Way Galaxy runs diagonally along the bottom-left corner, while the colorful Rho Ophiuchi cloud complex is visible just right of center and the large red circular Zeta Ophiuchi Nebula appears near the top. In general, red emanates from nebulas glowing in the light of excited hydrogen gas, while blue marks interstellar dust preferentially reflecting the light of bright young stars. Thick dust usually appears dark brown. Many iconic objects of the night sky appear, including (can you find them?) the bright star Antares, the globular star cluster M4, and the Blue Horsehead nebula. This wide field composite, taken over 17 hours, was captured from South Africa last June.
